name: Cred Dump Tools Dropped Files
description: Files with well-known filenames (parts of credential dump software or files produced by them) creation
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator using tool for password recovery
query: (file.path:(/.*\\[Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*\\[Kk][Ii][Rr][Bb][Ii].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Cc][Ee]_[Cc][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Cc][Ee]_[Kk][Rr][Bb][Tt][Kk][Tt][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Gg][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\-[Ll][Oo][Gg].*/) OR file.path:(/.*\\[Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt]\.[Pp][Ww][Dd]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Rr][Aa]64\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Rr][Aa]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Gg][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Cc][Ee][Aa][Uu][Xx]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Aa][Mm]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Tt][Dd][Ss]\.[Oo][Uu][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp][Ss][Vv][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ss][Tt][Gg][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Pp][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Pp][Ww]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:(*\\pwdump* OR *\\kirbi* OR *\\pwhashes* OR *\\wce_ccache* OR *\\wce_krbtkts* OR *\\fgdump\-log*) OR file.path:(*\\test.pwd OR *\\lsremora64.dll OR *\\lsremora.dll OR *\\fgexec.exe OR *\\wceaux.dll OR *\\SAM.out OR *\\SECURITY.out OR *\\SYSTEM.out OR *\\NTDS.out OR *\\DumpExt.dll OR *\\DumpSvc.exe OR *\\cachedump64.exe OR *\\cachedump.exe OR *\\pstgdump.exe OR *\\servpw.exe OR *\\servpw64.exe OR *\\pwdump.exe OR *\\procdump64.exe))`
